about_the_game:
The Sheep Among Us is a multiplayer social-deduction game where players need to blend in with the AI sheep, identify the real players, and strike before they do!

Blending In with AI

Hone your sheepish instincts to flawlessly blend in with the AI herd. Graze, wander, and baa like a pro, but don’t get too comfortable—these AI sheep exhibit sophisticated, unpredictable behaviours that can make mimicking them a real challenge! Stay alert as you keep a watchful eye on the flock, looking for subtle signs that reveal which of them might also be players hiding in plain sight.

Hunt or Be Hunted

Observe closely, spot the odd movements, and strike with precision—but strategy matters. Build up your energy by grazing and eating food scattered across the map, then unleash a powerful dash to take down unsuspecting opponents. Be careful, though—every attack risks exposing your true identity, turning you into the next target.

Get creative with your eliminations! Lay sneaky traps to catch opponents off guard, or manipulate the environment to force them into deadly map hazards. Will you outwit the flock with clever tactics or become prey in this battle of wits?

Maps

Explore three distinct maps, each with unique challenges to test your survival skills. Adapt your strategy to thrive in diverse environments featuring different types of cover and power ups. Many food items grow across the maps, each offering abilities to give you the edge! You may be able to gain brief invisibility, set decoy trap sheep or command the AI sheep to fight for you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7-8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
